message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm initially offering it to you at $12,000. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $12,000 price point. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,500?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, the $12,000 price reflects the true value of this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but based on my financial situation, I am only able to consider offers within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price closer to $9,000?
